PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Using the COLOR field, this keyword is colored pink instead of the normal keyword color.
Attacks that are Magic use Focus instead of Strength.
Trigger the following effect upon dealing unblocked Attack damage.
Discard this card if you play another one while this is in your hand.
Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.
Retain excess block at the start of your turn.
Trigger the following effect when this card is discarded during your turn.
Orb: Increases damage but damages you every turn. When #yEvoked, deals damage to ALL enemies.
